A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I went for the effects and the visuals - and it didn't disappoint. I didn't go for the story\, the writing or the addition of any compelling characters - and I got what I expected. If you want to see the best special effects that money can buy on a huge and grand scale\, by all means go. If a shiny object with less substance annoys you\, perhaps wait until its On Demand.
